name: reactions_delete-for-issue
description:
**Note:** You can also specify a repository by `repository_id` using the route `DELETE /repositories/:repository_id/issues/:issue_number/reactions/:reaction_id`.

Delete a reaction to an [issue](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/rest/reference/issues/).

owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

issue_number.description: The number that identifies the issue.

reaction_id.description: The unique identifier of the reaction.
